text: Jadom avagi'a karana vali'am ne apane dilam vica atama jida dhaida kiti ate jida vi agi'anata vasa. Phira alaha ne apane valom sakinata (sukha santi) prakasita kiti apane rasulam ate imana vali'am upara ate alaha ne unham nu takava (alaha da dara) di gala upara tika'i rakhi'a ate uha isa de vadhika hakadara ate yoga sana. Ate alaha hara ciza nu janana vala hai
